title: 原版可以实现悬浮字么
author: 笨熊熊
txt_content: 原版可以实现悬浮字么,如果可以,怎么实现.

replies.author: xiang_xge
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 xiang_xge 于 2020-4-14 09:28 编辑 

使用隐形盔甲架1.12-
/summon minecraft:armor_stand ~ ~-1.5 ~ {CustomName:"哈哈哈",DisabledSlots:65793,CustomNameVisible:1b,Invisible:1b,NoGravity:1b}复制代码1.13+
/summon minecraft:armor_stand ~ ~-1.5 ~ {CustomName:"{"text":"哈哈哈"}",DisabledSlots:65793,CustomNameVisible:1b,Invisible:1b,NoGravity:1b}复制代码
悬空的“哈哈哈”

replies.author: 笨熊熊
replies.txt_content:
xiang_xge 发表于 2020-4-14 09:23
使用隐形盔甲架1.12-
1.13+
感谢
更改隐形盔甲架的名称
